html: Let all the nations be gathered together. The Lord symbolically gathers the nations and peoples together and challenges them to "bring forth their witnesses," such as false prophets or gods, to show that they have, in the past, prophesied of something that has come to pass. If they do so, they will "be justified," or proved right. Otherwise, let them "hear" God's witnesses (our prophets, apostles, and missionaries) and agree that they speak the truth ("It is truth").
